chapter.title: The node controller
chapter.para: The /node context path returns the value assigned to node. The response type tag matches the port value type held.

sect1.title: Type tag and parameters
sect1.para: The type tag of the request looks like following: ,s.

tr.td: Path is any valid accessor for properties or port value.
